page.title: 15MY SATURDAY.S.HEDINGHAM
page.content: I wake up and read my book. I let my dog Benji out side for a run. Next I have my breakfast,Cornflakes,Bovril on Toast and a cup of tea. Then I go up stairs to get dressed. I put on Knickers,Socks,Trousers,Tee-shirt and a Jumper. I play with Benji. I put my Ankle-boots and coat on ready to go to Sudbury with my family, in the car to do the shopping. On arrival we find a place to park the car. We go to a Supermarket and get our food shopping. We get the dog food from Boots the Chemist. We then have time to enjoy looking around all the other shops to buy such things as Clothes,Shoes,Toys and China. We also visit the Open Air Market. We then return to the car for the journey home to unpack the shopping and have lunch. LYNNE KIRKHAM.AGE 10.
